alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sedgwick County through 245 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms are over portions of Sedgwick County. These storms are moving very slow and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Sedgwick, Colwich, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Andale, Eastborough and Bentley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 22. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
